caption.p: Scanning electron micrograph (SEM) of Biochar ( a), BNF-2 ( d), and BCRNF ( g) (scale bar, 20 µm). The map overlay of the red selected region of Biochar ( a), BNF-2 ( d), and BCRNF ( g) showing the heterogeneous distribution of C, N, O, Al, Si, P, Cl, and K in ( b), ( e), ( h), respectively (scale bar, 20 µm). The corresponding X-ray energy dispersive spectra (EDS) of the red selected region of Biochar ( c), BNF-2 ( f), and BCRNF ( i) are shown in the right column.
